		Question: Who has the highest career rushing attempts in the FBS division of NCAA football?
		Answer:
answer:
The answer is: Jim Brown. 

Jim Brown is an American former professional football player and former professional wrestler. He played running back in the National Football League (NFL) for the Cleveland Browns. He is considered one of the greatest running backs of all time. Brown holds the record for the highest number of career rushing attempts in the Football Bowl Subdivision (FBS) of NCAA football. He rushed for a total of 4,382 yards and 328 touchdowns in his college career
